header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Adaptable software engineer with 6+ years developing web applications and backend services across financial technology, streaming media, and construction industries. Proven expertise in C# .NET, service-oriented architectures, and cloud platforms with a strong track record of delivering custom solutions through fast-paced projects. Experienced mentoring teammates, supporting production systems with on-call availability, and applying sound design principles while maintaining pragmatic approaches to meet deadlines.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Designed and implemented a streaming data platform providing schema registry and integration libraries for event-driven microservices processing millions of daily events across distributed systems
Built a state management system enabling applications to maintain real-time state from event streams, successfully deployed to production supporting critical content metadata workflows
Developed CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions with automated validation, compatibility checking, and multi-language artifact deployment supporting rapid delivery cycles
Collaborated across teams to troubleshoot production issues, providing on-call support and implementing solutions under tight deadlines while maintaining system stability
Mentored team members on design patterns, cloud services, and best practices for building scalable distributed systems
Migrated schema definitions improving type safety and reducing runtime errors across distributed services

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer

Built a RESTful HTTP management API enabling operators to configure systems, manage cryptographic keys, and monitor operations in real-time
Created a data streaming service with MongoDB integration providing real-time data access through a well-defined API, enabling downstream applications to consume blockchain events
Designed a React web interface demonstrating integration capabilities, working across the entire stack to deliver complete solutions from frontend to backend

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II

Collaborated in an Agile development environment with code reviews, sprint planning, and iterative delivery cycles, consistently meeting deadlines
Supported production systems with troubleshooting, bug fixes, and flexible hours for deployments and emergency support on an on-call rotation

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
